name: Haunted Barrel
description:
One of the barrels is haunted, but the ghost is shy. it will only move when you're not looking at it.  Identify which barrel is haunted, and left click to accuse a barrel of harboring spirits. 

Its like hide and seek, but spoopy. 

Use WASD and Mouse for movement. 

This was made for the low effort game jam. 

Special Thanks to 

Jordan Han - Vard The Vampire Soundtrack 

SOI's 3d tavern pack assets.
